analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/40/0xe199c41103020a325ee17fd87934dfe7ac747ad4.sol:
	Contract BitFwdToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/40/0xe199c41103020a325ee17fd87934dfe7ac747ad4.sol#251-252)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/40/0xe199c41103020a325ee17fd87934dfe7ac747ad4.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/40/0xe199c41103020a325ee17fd87934dfe7ac747ad4.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/40/0xe199c41103020a325ee17fd87934dfe7ac747ad4.sol#96) is not in mixedCase
